info:
Anec-Do-Tell is a project for IU F24 PMLDL course done by @NA_Nevermind @MagiaDrive and @Anr_y_an. It's based on GPT2 trained by us on retrieved data from different sourses.
Our teams' GitHub is: https://github.com/MagiaDrive/Anec-Do-Tell 
 Thank you for your interest!
tell: Unfortunally AI isn't connected to this model yet. We are working on it!
